title: Introducing: Bully
body:
Nashville quartet **Bully** may well be one of the most exciting new bands of the past twelve months.

Having opened for Best Coast earlier this year, and with a self-titled EP released in October, 2014 is shaping up rather nicely for Alicia Bognanno, Kyle Hunter, Stewart Copeland and Daniel Severs. Their no holds barred energetic songwriting is quite frankly, something that’s been in lacklustre supply for the majority of this year, even managing to throw a couple of killer choruses into the mix along the way. Check out the full EP below, including personal highlight Brainfreeze, and pick up one of these [uber cool t-shirts](http://bullythemusic.bandcamp.com/merch/parking-lot-t-shirt) while you’re at.
